title: Do you want more keys?
body:
Let's play together!
Playing in a premade group increases the chances of getting keys AND chests!
If you need chests, I highly recommend playing arams with a group of friends, this way even if you get a random champ you suck at, chances are one of your friends is gonna get a high rate and so you'll get a chest from that champ you are really bad at without struggling yourself to get a super score!

Add me for tons of aram!

replies.body:
I feel I should point out that you can't earn a mastery chest for a champion you don't own, same reason as why farming free week champions won't work.

You can still get key frags but then again you could do this exactly the same in twisted treeline or regular summoners rift blinds or ranked (not saying that arams aren't fun) and often arams can take really long times. I once had an aram go for around a tad over 140 minutes, it was exciting sure, the back and forth and the  turn around were extreme but if I was just intending to farm keys the 20min (+10min waiting) matches of twisted treeline or regular 30min summoners rift matches would have been much quicker.

are you seriously saying that rift games are shorter than arams lol.
i've only ever had a couple of long arams, lasting about 45 and 60 mins, but really usually they last around 25.
rift games last around 45 mins as far as i remember.

and yes you can earn chests in the rift and the treeline also, the thing is in aram is easier because most people get a champ that they don't master so it's easier to get a higher score if you or your mates get one you are good at, so if one does good everybody gets one, even if their score is awful.

my conclusion is if you want chests go for arams, if you want keys go for treeline or rift with champs you are good at, since you only get keys if you win.

i finished saying add me for aram not because i think they are the best for loots, but simply because i don't play rift because i don't like to get stuck in long games with toxic people, so 99% of the times i play aram.

cheers!
Playing tons of arams just made me feel, umm honestly, kinda sick xDDDDD.....

look, i don't know, buy more champs maybe? i've heard of people playing only rift always same role always same champ because they have better win rate or counterplay in the current meta. now that would be f..reaking boring and repetitive for me

Haha dude...On another server I ever played on, I had like 1000+ arams with the win rate of around 48%, compared to rift games less than 100.
During that period of time I was just horrified to play rift mode because of both the lack of confidence and champs of me, and the rapid pacing of aram mode.
